Alvin TeoLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated 1d agoHttps://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management_buyoutImagine a Chef who started a restaurant with a sleeper partner just to fund business. Over years if the chef has saved up quite abit, he may be keen to buy out the partner’s share to keep running the business.If buyouts are from management, usually the intention is to further the business, read the reports they put out and determine if it’s good for you.0 comments1
